name: Nalea
appearance: Short and slight with chalk-stained fingertips and ink-dotted cuffs. Eyes accustomed to glow fungus light; voice never above a whisper.
character: Careful and curious, she files every rumor and song fragment into a living index.
talents: Perfect pitch for the Cairn's songs
Finding patterns in votes by hue
flaws: Salt-burnt fingers that ache in dry heat
dreams: Write a lull for the heartstone
See the Monastery saints cast dawn light
Free the Archive from factional tug-of-war
secrets: A drowned book page whispers only her name at night
Stole a prismatic brine counter once to test a theory
Knows a shelf that bends away from names written upon it
